attributes.action: Suspend Foreign Aid Until Full Investigation into Wasteful Spending is Conducted
attributes.additional_details: Britain is in crisis—veterans are homeless, families rely on food banks, and people freeze in their homes. Yet, billions are sent abroad while illegal immigrants live in hotels with free meals and benefits, draining our system. Our services are collapsing under the strain of people who should not be here and have contributed nothing. Enough is enough. We demand a pause, full audit, and a complete reassessment of spending to put British citizens first.
attributes.background: Suspend all foreign aid until a full investigation is conducted. UK citizens are struggling—veterans are homeless, families can’t afford heating or food, yet illegal immigrants receive first-class treatment in hotels. We demand transparency to ensure taxpayer money is prioritised for British needs.

rejection.details:
